verses.kjv: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
verses.ct: The LORD is my shepherd; I have everything I need.

verses.kjv: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.
verses.ct: He lets me rest in lush meadows and guides me along peaceful streams.

verses.kjv: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his nameâ€™s sake.
verses.ct: He renews my soul. He leads me down the right paths for the honor of his name.

verses.kjv: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
verses.ct: Even when I walk through the darkest valley, I won't be afraid of any danger, because you are right there with me. Your rod and your staff give me comfort.

verses.kjv: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.
verses.ct: You spread a feast for me while my enemies look on. You pour oil on my head, and my cup overflows.

verses.kjv: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
verses.ct: Without a doubt, goodness and mercy will stay with me every day of my life, and I will live in the house of the LORD forever.
